title: ‘I Was Dizzy, Nauseous’: Jonas Vingegaard Reveals Paris-Nice Concussion, Road toward Tour de France Unclear
content:
Another pothole in the path toward the Tour: Visma-Lease a Bike leader missed nine days of training and remains uncertain if he'll race again before June.

Read the full article at ‘I Was Dizzy, Nauseous’: Jonas Vingegaard Reveals Paris-Nice Concussion, Road toward Tour de France Unclear on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
